response_text:
<![CDATA[CBC | Arts News ]]> http://www.cbc.ca/arts/?cmp=rss en-ca Fri, 13 May 2016 01:14:54 EDT CBC.ca http://www.cbc.ca/rss/image/cbc_144.gif http://www.cbc.ca/news/?cmp=rss <![CDATA[Katherine Dunn, author of Geek Love, dead at 70]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/katherine-dunn-writer-obit-1.3580454?cmp=rss 1.3580454 Fri, 13 May 2016 00:53:22 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

Writer Katherine Dunn, who was famous for her novel Geek Love, has died at her Portland, Ore. home. She was 70.

]]> <![CDATA[Afrika Bambaataa denies child sex abuse accusations]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/afrika-bambaataa-denies-child-sex-abuse-accusations-1.3580473?cmp=rss 1.3580473 Fri, 13 May 2016 01:14:54 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

Hip-hop pioneer Afrika Bambaataa is speaking out to deny accusations from men who claim he sexually abused them as teenagers at the peak of his career in the 1980s.

]]> <![CDATA['It would take a lot to offend me,' Woody Allen says of Laurent Lafitte's rape joke at Cannes]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/woody-allen-laurent-lafitte-cannes-1.3579138?cmp=rss 1.3579138 Thu, 12 May 2016 13:36:58 EDT CBC News News/Arts & Entertainment

Though Woody Allen says he wasn't upset by a controversial joke made at his expense on the opening night of the Cannes Film Festival, the evening's host says he would have cut it had he understood the context surrounding the American filmmaker.

]]> <![CDATA['Kids my age are losing their lives:' Trayvon Martin play explores teen's galvanizing death]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/trayvon-martin-play-1.3578770?cmp=rss 1.3578770 Thu, 12 May 2016 10:01:50 EDT Errin Haines Whack News/Arts & Entertainment

Trayvon Martin has often been in the thoughts of playwright and activist Rajendra Ramoon Maharaj in the four years since the 17-year-old unarmed black boy was shot and killed after a confrontation with neighbourhood watchman George Zimmerman.

]]> <![CDATA[No kitsch please, we're British: UK torn on glam Eurovision]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/eurovision-uk-love-hate-relationship-1.3579460?cmp=rss 1.3579460 Thu, 12 May 2016 15:12:18 EDT Jill Lawless News/Arts & Entertainment

Saturday's Eurovision grand final is likely to be watched by almost 200 million viewers across Europe, but in pop as in politics, Britain stands apart. U.K. viewers will tune in, too — but with sarcastic commentary, guilty pleasure at all the cheesy Euro-pop, and the suspicion Britain is not going to emerge on top.

]]> <![CDATA[Trolls stars Justin Timberlake, Anna Kendrick serenade Cannes with Cyndi Lauper cover]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/cannes-justin-timberlake-anna-kendrick-trolls-1.3577443?cmp=rss 1.3577443 Wed, 11 May 2016 14:31:09 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

"Anna and Garfunkel" is how Justin Timberlake introduced himself and Anna Kendrick for an acoustic performance of Cyndi Lauper's True Colors at the Cannes Film Festival.

]]> <![CDATA[k.d. lang says Royal Conservatory fellowship has personal meaning to her]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/calgary/kdlang-royal-conservatory-fellowship-1.3579154?cmp=rss 1.3579154 Thu, 12 May 2016 12:52:08 EDT David Friend News/Canada/Calgary

Alberta native k.d. lang studied the piano standards of the Royal Conservatory of Music growing up. On Thursday, she'll become an honorary fellow of the organization.

]]> <![CDATA[Morley Safer, Canadian-born 60 Minutes correspondent, retires at 84]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/morley-safer-retires-1.3577884?cmp=rss 1.3577884 Wed, 11 May 2016 17:01:01 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

CBS News veteran Morley Safer, who's been a correspondent on 60 Minutes for all but two of the show's 48 seasons, is retiring.

]]> <![CDATA[N.B. artist shocked by copycat paintings found in B.C.]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/new-brunswick/sussex-artist-portrait-controversy-1.3578619?cmp=rss 1.3578619 Thu, 12 May 2016 08:53:13 EDT Rachel Cave News/Canada/New Brunswick

A Sussex artist says he's surprised and disappointed to learn one of his paintings was apparently copied without his permission and without compensation.

]]> <![CDATA[Cy Twombly Blackboard painting sells for $36.7M at Sotheby's auction]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/sothebys-twombly-bacon-warhol-1.3578454?cmp=rss 1.3578454 Wed, 11 May 2016 23:47:24 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

A Francis Bacon double-panel self-portrait and a Cy Twombly Blackboard painting executed in blue — both in private collections for decades — were the highlights of Sotheby's auction of contemporary art on Wednesday.

]]> <![CDATA['I feel like a zoo animal': Justin Bieber says no more photos with fans]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/justin-bieber-no-more-photos-with-fans-1.3576860?cmp=rss 1.3576860 Wed, 11 May 2016 11:58:59 EDT CBC News News/Arts & Entertainment

Pop star Justin Bieber took to Instagram on Tuesday with a statement explaining that he is 'done taking pictures' with his fans.

]]> <![CDATA[Lucasfilm and Disney launching The Star Wars Show online]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/lucasfilm-disney-the-star-wars-show-1.3577665?cmp=rss 1.3577665 Wed, 11 May 2016 15:57:28 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

The Force is so strong with the Star Wars franchise that Lucasfilm and Disney are producing a weekly online video series about it.

]]> <![CDATA[Actress Emma Watson's company named in Panama Papers]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/emma-watson-named-in-panama-papers-1.3577406?cmp=rss 1.3577406 Wed, 11 May 2016 14:54:40 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

Watson's company, Falling Leaves Ltd., was named in the series of leaked documents that revealed how some politicians and celebrities hide money.

]]> <![CDATA[Woody Allen opens Cannes, as son resurrects sex abuse questions]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/woody-allen-cannes-film-festival-ronan-farrow-1.3577030?cmp=rss 1.3577030 Wed, 11 May 2016 11:21:08 EDT The Associated Press News/Arts & Entertainment

The 69th Cannes Film Festival has opened amid stormy skies, heightened security and the premiere of a new Woody Allen film that prompted a letter from his son Ronan Farrow questioning the festival's and the media's continued embrace of the director.

]]> <![CDATA[Former Top Gear hosts name new Amazon show The Grand Tour]]> http://www.cbc.ca/news/arts/the-grand-tour-top-gear-amazon-prime-show-1.3576863?cmp=rss 1.3576863 Wed, 11 May 2016 11:13:40 EDT CBC News News/Arts & Entertainment

Top Gear's original trio announced Wednesday that their new show will be called The Grand Tour.

]]>
